summary.para: Values that identify various data, texture, and buffer types that can be assigned to a shader variable.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_TYPE.D3D_SVT_VOID
member.summary: The variable is a void pointer.

member.summary: The variable is a boolean.

summary.para: The variable is a structured buffer.
For more information about structured buffer, see the Remarks section.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_TYPE.D3D_SVT_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: This value is not used by a programmer; it exists to force the enumeration to compile to 32 bits.
